mapper.select: select * from boardcomment where board_no=#{board_no} order by reg_date DESC LIMIT #{start_index}, 10
mapper.insert: insert into boardcomment(user_no, board_no, content, reg_date, type, commenter_name, profile_img, comment_private) VALUES (#{user_no}, #{board_no}, #{content}, #{reg_date}, #{type}, #{commenter_name}, #{profile_img}, #{comment_private})
mapper.update: update boardcomment SET comment_private=#{comment_private}, commenter_name=#{commenter_name}, profile_img=#{profile_img} WHERE comment_no=#{comment_no}
